summary: Nine strangers, with no apparent connection between them are abducted: drugged, kidnapped and sealed in a house together.
cast: Kelly Brook|Dennis Hopper|Hippolyte Girardot|Ashley Walters|Raffaello Degruttola|Peter Capaldi|Susie Amy|Morven Christie|Julienne Davis|Jim Carter|Gabriel Spahiu
title: 9 extraños
